response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations. Given its unique qualities and the effort put into its creation, we believe it's worth $800,000 to you. We kindly invite you to consider this offer and explore the possibilities of owning this masterpiece. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 800000}
